dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine systems have become an important supporting for the medical staffs As the development of the mobile phones it is possible to apply the mobile phones to be a part of telemedicine systems We developed an innovative Remote Patient Monitoring System using a Java enabled 3G mobile phone By using this system doctors can monitor the vital biosignals of patients in ICU CCU such as ECG RESP SpO2 EtCO2 and so on by using the real time waveform and data monitoring and list trend data monitoring functions of installed Java jiglet application on the mobile phone Futhermore doctors can check the patients information by using the patient information checking function The 3G mobile phone used has the ability to implement the application as the same time as being used to mak a voice call Therefore the doctor can get more and more information both from the browsing the screen of the mobile phone and the communicating with the medical staffs who are beside the patients and the monitors The system can be conducted to evaluate the diagnostic accuracy efficiency and safety of telediagnosis
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
At risk for a particular disease or infection
A remote patient monitoring system using a Java-enabled 3G mobile phone.
